text: Toddy Elizabeth Walters (born October 24, 1969 in Denver, Colorado) is an American actress, singer and songwriter. Walters went to the University of Colorado, where she met Trey Parker, who was casting his first live-action film Cannibal! The Musical released by Troma in 1997. She was cast in the role of Polly Pry. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Denver Category:Singers from Denver Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Writers from Denver
title: Toddy Walters
